metadata.titleEn: ChinaHighPM10: High-resolution and High-quality Ground-level PM10 Dataset for China (2000-2023)
metadata.titleCn: 中国高分辨率高质量PM10数据集（2000-2023）
metadata.description:
ChinaHighPM10 is one of the series of long-term, full-coverage, high-resolution, and high-quality datasets of ground-level air pollutants for China (i.e., ChinaHighAirPollutants, CHAP). It is generated from the big data (e.g., ground-based measurements, satellite remote sensing products, atmospheric reanalysis, and model simulations) using artificial intelligence by considering the spatiotemporal heterogeneity of air pollution. This is the big data-derived seamless (spatial coverage = 100%) daily, monthly, and yearly 1 km (i.e., D1K, M1K, and Y1K) ground-level PM10 dataset in China from 2000 to present. This dataset yields a high quality with a cross-validation coefficient of determination (CV-R2) of 0.90 and a root-mean-square error (RMSE) of 21.12 µg m-3 on a daily basis. Note that this dataset is continuously updated, and if you want to apply for more data or have any questions, please contact me (Email: weijing_rs@163.com; weijing@umd.edu).
The data file contains four codes (Python, Matlab, IDL and R language) nc2geotiff codes for NC to GeoTiff.
metadata.descriptionCn:
ChinaHighPM10数据集是中国高分辨率高质量近地表空气污染物数据集（ChinaHighAirPollutants, CHAP）中PM10数据集。该数据集利用人工智能技术，使用模式资料填补了卫星MODIS MAIAC AOD产品的空间缺失值，结合地基观测、大气再分析和排放清单等大数据生产得到2000年至今全国无缝隙地面PM10数据。数据十折交叉验证决定系数R2为0.90，均方根误差RMSE为21.12 µg/m3。主要范围为整个中国地区，空间分辨率为1 km，时间分辨率为日、月、年，单位为µg/m3。注意：该数据集持续更新，如需要更多数据，请发邮件联系作者（weijing_rs@163.com; weijing@umd.edu）。
数据文件中包含NC转GeoTiff的四种代码（Python、Matlab、IDL和R语言）nc2geotiff codes。
metadata.instructions: File Name: The data is stored in the NetCDF file format, and the file name is CHAP_PM10_ab_yyyymmdd_V1.nc, where a represents time resolution (D represents daily data, M represents monthly data, Y represents annual data), b represents spatial resolution (1K represents 1km), yyyy represents year, mm represents month, and dd represents day. Data reading method: Python, Matlab, IDL, and other programming methods can be used to convert files from NC to TIF. The data coordinate system is WGS-1984, with a background value of 65535.
metadata.instructionsCn: 文件命名：该数据以NetCDF文件格式存储，文件的名称为CHAP_PM10_ab_yyyymmdd_V1.nc，其中a表示时间分辨率（D表示日数据，M表示月数据，Y表示年数据），b表示空间分辨率（1K表示1km），yyyy代表年，mm表示月，dd表示日。数据读取方式：可用Python、Matlab、IDL等编程实现文件从nc到tif的转换。数据坐标系为WGS-1984，背景值为65535。

literatureList.titleEn: The ChinaHighPM10 dataset: generation, validation, and spatiotemporal variations from 2015 to 2019 across China
literatureList.referenceEn: Wei, J., Li, Z., Xue, W., Sun, L., Fan, T., Liu, L., Su, T., & Cribb, M. (2021). The ChinaHighPM10 dataset: generation, validation, and spatiotemporal variations from 2015 to 2019 across China. Environment International, 146, 106290. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.envint.2020.106290

background: Respirable particles with aerodynamic diameters ≤ 10 µm (PM10) have important impacts on the atmospheric environment and human health. While PM10 mainly comes from nature, e.g., dust, soil, and sea salt, anthropogenic activities also play an important role in the emission of PM10, such as construction-generated dust, insufficient combustion of fossil fuels, and discharge of industrial residues. PM10 is thus of great concern to both the atmospheric environment and human health, given its potential contribution to cancer, respiratory diseases, and heart diseases, especially in developing countries like China. The Chinese Ministry of Environmental Protection has thus established a national ground-based monitoring network to monitor typical air pollutants (e.g., PM10, PM2.5, ozone, and sulfur dioxide) in real time. Satellite remote sensing has the advantage of providing complete and uniform coverage. A positive relationship between AOD and near-surface PM concentrations has been shown despite uncertainties due to various sources of the retrievals. At present, satellite-based PM estimation methods fall into four main categories: physical models, chemical models, statistical regression models, and artificial intelligence. Despite these efforts, further improvements can be made in estimating near-surface PM10 concentrations in China.
research objective: To overcome these limitations, we have adopted here a more accurate ensemble learning approach by integrating spatiotemporal information, resulting in a method called the space-time extremely randomized trees (STET). This method was used to establish robust PM10-AOD relationships. A high-quality PM10 dataset at a spatial resolution of 1 km covering China was finally generated from the STET model, i.e., ChinaHighPM10, using the newly released MODIS 1-km Multi-Angle Implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) aerosol product, along with meteorological, land use, topography, and population data as input.
challenges: Despite these efforts, further improvements can be made in estimating near-surface PM10 concentrations in China. First, traditional physical, chemical, and statistical regression models generally have less data mining abilities than do machine learning methods. Second, most previous studies employed MODIS AOD products generated from the Dark Target (DT) or Deep Blue (DB) aerosol algorithms at spatial resolutions of 3 – 10 km. The coarse-resolution PM10 dataset generated thus has limited applications in medium- or small-scale areas such as urban regions where air pollution is much more locally concentrated than in rural regions. Last, PM10 is less intensively studied than PM2.5 in China, possibly because coarser particles have less impact on human health for the same mass concentration.
methods: For the STET model, daily PM10 ground-based measurements, AOD, along with 12 auxiliary factors, are first spatiotemporally collocated at each PM10 monitoring station in each year and are used to form the data samples. Second, a training set (n) is randomly selected from all data samples (N), and m features are randomly selected from all features (M) without replacement. Then a split (s*) is selected among all generated splits (S) according to the calculated scores (s*, S), and an extremely randomized tree is built based on the Classification And Regression Tree (CART) algorithm. Last, the above steps are repeated to construct numerous extremely randomized trees as weak classifiers, which are then combined to form a strong classifier.
dataset: The 1-km resolution Multi-Angle Implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) aerosol product and auxiliary factors, including meteorology, land-use cover, surface elevation, population distribution, and pollutant emissions, are used in the STET model to generate the high-resolution (1 km) and high-quality PM10 dataset for China (i.e., ChinaHighPM10) from 2015 to 2019. PM10 near the ground has been monitored across China by China’s National Environmental Monitoring Center (CNEMC) at 1480 stations in 2015 then increased to 1605 stations in 2019.
findings: The product has an out-of-sample (out-of-station) cross-validation coefficient of determination (CV-R2) of 0.86 (0.82) and a root-mean-square error (RMSE) of 24.28 (27.07) μg/m3, outperforming most widely used models from previous related studies. High levels of PM10 concentration occurred in northwest China (e.g., the Tarim Basin) and the Northern China Plain. Overall, PM10 concentrations had a significant declining trend of 5.81 μg/m3 per year (p < 0.001) over the past five years in China, especially in three key urban agglomerations. The ChinaHighPM10 dataset is potentially useful for future small- and medium-scale air pollution studies by virtue of its higher spatial resolution and overall accuracy.
backgroundCn: 可吸入颗粒物（PM10）具有重要的环境和人类健康影响，其气动直径≤10微米。PM10主要来源于自然，例如尘土、土壤和海盐，但人类活动在PM10的排放中也发挥了重要作用，如建筑产生的尘埃、化石燃料的不完全燃烧以及工业废物的排放。因此，PM10对大气环境和人类健康的关注度很高，尤其是在中国等发展中国家，因为它可能导致癌症、呼吸系统疾病和心脏疾病。中国环境保护部因此建立了国家地面监测网络，以实时监测典型空气污染物（如PM10、PM2.5、臭氧和二氧化硫）。卫星遥感具有提供全面和均匀覆盖的优势。尽管由于各种检索源的不确定性，气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）与近地面PM浓度之间存在正相关关系。目前，基于卫星的PM估算方法主要分为四大类：物理模型、化学模型、统计回归模型和人工智能。尽管已有这些努力，但在估算中国近地面PM10浓度方面仍有进一步改进的空间。
research objectiveCn: 为了克服这些局限性，我们在此采用了一种更准确的集成学习方法，通过整合时空信息，提出了一种称为时空极端随机树（STET）的方法。该方法用于建立稳健的PM10-AOD关系。最终，利用STET模型生成了一个覆盖中国的高质量PM10数据集，空间分辨率为1公里，即ChinaHighPM10，使用了新发布的MODIS 1公里多角度大气校正（MAIAC）气溶胶产品，以及气象、土地利用、地形和人口数据作为输入。
challengesCn: 尽管采取了这些措施，但在估计中国近地面PM10浓度方面仍然可以进一步改进。首先，传统的物理、化学和统计回归模型通常比机器学习方法的数据挖掘能力较弱。其次，大多数先前的研究采用了由暗目标（DT）或深蓝（DB）气溶胶算法生成的MODIS AOD产品，空间分辨率为3-10公里。因此，生成的粗分辨率PM10数据集在中小规模区域（如城市地区）中的应用有限，而这些地方的空气污染比农村地区更为集中。最后，PM10在中国的研究相对较少，可能是因为相同质量浓度下，粗颗粒对人类健康的影响较小。
methodsCn: 对于STET模型，首先将每日PM10地面监测数据、气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）以及12个辅助因子在每个PM10监测站的每一年进行时空协同，形成数据样本。其次，从所有数据样本（N）中随机选择一个训练集（n），并从所有特征（M）中随机选择m个特征，且不进行替换。然后，在所有生成的分割（S）中选择一个分割（s*），根据计算的分数（s*, S）进行选择，并基于分类与回归树（CART）算法构建一个极端随机树。最后，重复上述步骤以构建多个极端随机树作为弱分类器，然后将它们组合成一个强分类器。
datasetCn: 1公里分辨率的多角度大气校正实施（MAIAC）气溶胶产品及辅助因子，包括气象、土地利用覆盖、地表海拔、人口分布和污染物排放，被用于STET模型，以生成中国的高分辨率（1公里）和高质量PM10数据集（即ChinaHighPM10），时间范围为2015年至2019年。2015年，中国国家环境监测中心（CNEMC）在全国范围内监测了1480个站点的地面PM10浓度，到2019年增加到1605个站点。
findingsCn: 该产品的样本外（站外）交叉验证决定系数（CV-R2）为0.86（0.82），均方根误差（RMSE）为24.28（27.07）μg/m3，优于大多数相关研究中广泛使用的模型。中国西北地区（例如塔里木盆地）和华北平原的PM10浓度水平较高。总体而言，中国过去五年PM10浓度呈显著下降趋势，每年下降5.81 μg/m3（p < 0.001），尤其是在三个关键城市群中。ChinaHighPM10数据集由于其更高的空间分辨率和整体准确性，可能对未来的小型和中型空气污染研究具有潜在的实用价值。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the use of artificial intelligence in data collection methods improve the estimation of near-surface PM10 concentrations?
Verification.QuestionCn: 使用人工智能的数据收集方法是否改善了近地面PM10浓度的估计？

Verification.QuestionEn: Are satellite-based PM estimation methods limited by the spatial resolution of the aerosol products?
Verification.QuestionCn: 卫星基于PM估计的方法是否受到气溶胶产品空间分辨率的限制？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the ChinaHighPM10 dataset generated at a spatial resolution of 1 km?
Verification.QuestionCn: ChinaHighPM10 数据集的空间分辨率是 1 公里吗？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Does the STET model used for PM10 data generation primarily involve physical models, chemical models, statistical regression models, or artificial intelligence?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: STET模型用于PM10数据生成主要涉及物理模型、化学模型、统计回归模型还是人工智能？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the main challenges in estimating near-surface PM10 concentrations in China?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在中国估计近地面PM10浓度的主要挑战是什么？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: limited data mining abilities, coarse resolution of PM10 datasets, less intensive study of PM10
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 有限的数据挖掘能力，PM10数据集的粗分辨率，对PM10的研究不够深入。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are PM10 monitoring stations located across China?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 中国各地PM10监测站的位置在哪里？
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 中国国家环境监测中心 (CNEMC)

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What auxiliary factors are used in the STET model to generate a high-resolution PM10 dataset?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: STET模型中用于生成高分辨率PM10数据集的辅助因素有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: meteorology, land-use cover, surface elevation, population distribution, pollutant emissions
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 气象学、土地利用覆盖、地表高程、人口分布、污染物排放

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in estimating near-surface PM10 concentrations using traditional models?
Example.QuestionCn: 在使用传统模型估计近地面PM10浓度时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge in estimating near-surface PM10 concentrations using traditional models is their limited data mining abilities compared to machine learning methods. These models often rely on coarse-resolution MODIS AOD products, which restricts their application in urban areas where air pollution is highly localized.
Example.AnswerCn: 估计近地面PM10浓度的一个挑战是传统模型的数据挖掘能力有限，相比之下，机器学习方法更具优势。这些模型通常依赖于粗分辨率的MODIS气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）产品，这限制了它们在空气污染高度局部化的城市地区的应用。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset that combines satellite data with auxiliary factors to improve PM10 estimation accuracy?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个结合卫星数据和辅助因素以提高PM10估计准确性的示例数据集？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset that combines satellite data with auxiliary factors is the high-resolution ChinaHighPM10 dataset. It uses the 1-km resolution Multi-Angle Implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) aerosol product along with meteorological data, land use, topography, population distribution, and pollutant emissions to enhance the accuracy of PM10 estimates.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个结合卫星数据和辅助因素的数据集的例子是高分辨率的ChinaHighPM10数据集。该数据集使用1公里分辨率的多角度大气校正（MAIAC）气溶胶产品，以及气象数据、土地利用、地形、人口分布和污染物排放，以提高PM10估计的准确性。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What characteristics define the challenges in accurately estimating near-surface PM10 concentrations?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 准确估算近地表PM10浓度的挑战有哪些特征？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: limited data mining abilities of traditional models, use of coarse-resolution MODIS AOD products
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 传统模型的数据挖掘能力有限，使用粗分辨率的MODIS AOD产品。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the spatial resolution of the PM10 dataset generated using the space-time extremely randomized trees (STET) model?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 使用时空极端随机树（STET）模型生成的PM10数据集的空间分辨率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many PM10 monitoring stations were there in China in 2019?
What is the root-mean-square error (RMSE) of the PM10 dataset when evaluated with out-of-sample validation?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在进行样本外验证时，PM10数据集的均方根误差（RMSE）是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the space-time extremely randomized trees (STET) approach in the context of estimating PM10 concentrations?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在估算PM10浓度的背景下，什么是时空极端随机树（STET）方法？
Definition.AnswerEn: The space-time extremely randomized trees (STET) approach is an ensemble learning method that integrates spatiotemporal information to establish robust PM10-AOD relationships. It involves spatiotemporal collocation of daily PM10 ground-based measurements and auxiliary factors at PM10 monitoring stations. The method constructs numerous extremely randomized trees using the Classification And Regression Tree (CART) algorithm as weak classifiers, which are combined to form a strong classifier.
Definition.AnswerCn: 空间时间极随机树（STET）方法是一种集成学习方法，整合了时空信息以建立稳健的PM10-AOD关系。该方法涉及在PM10监测站对每日PM10地面测量值和辅助因素进行时空配对。该方法使用分类与回归树（CART）算法作为弱分类器构建大量极随机树，并将其组合形成一个强分类器。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are some challenges associated with traditional models for estimating near-surface PM10 concentrations in China?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在中国，传统模型估算近地表PM10浓度有哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: Traditional physical, chemical, and statistical regression models generally have less data mining abilities compared to machine learning methods. They often use MODIS AOD products with coarser spatial resolutions, limiting the applications for small or urban areas where air pollution is more localized. Moreover, PM10 is less intensively studied than PM2.5, possibly due to a perceived lesser impact on human health for the same mass concentration.
Definition.AnswerCn: 传统的物理、化学和统计回归模型通常在数据挖掘能力上不如机器学习方法。它们通常使用MODIS AOD产品，这些产品的空间分辨率较粗，限制了在小型或城市地区的应用，而这些地区的空气污染更为局部。此外，PM10的研究强度低于PM2.5，这可能是因为在相同质量浓度下，PM10对人类健康的影响被认为较小。

Definition.QuestionEn: What auxiliary data sources are utilized in generating a high-resolution PM10 dataset for China?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在生成中国高分辨率PM10数据集时，使用了哪些辅助数据源？
Definition.AnswerEn: The high-resolution PM10 dataset is generated using the 1-km resolution Multi-Angle Implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) aerosol product along with auxiliary data including meteorology, land-use cover, surface elevation, population distribution, and pollutant emissions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 高分辨率PM10数据集是使用1公里分辨率的多角度大气校正（MAIAC）气溶胶产品生成的，并结合了气象、土地利用覆盖、地表高度、人口分布和污染物排放等辅助数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in data sources and methodologies between ground-based monitoring networks and satellite remote sensing for PM10 emission data collection in China?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 中国PM10排放数据收集的地面监测网络与卫星遥感在数据来源和方法论上的差异是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Ground-based monitoring networks in China, established by the Ministry of Environmental Protection, provide real-time data at numerous stations, whereas satellite remote sensing offers complete and uniform coverage using products like MODIS MAIAC AOD. The latter employs various models, such as statistical regression and AI, to estimate PM concentrations, integrating meteorology, land use, and other auxiliary factors.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 中国环境保护部建立的地面监测网络在多个站点提供实时数据，而卫星遥感则通过使用MODIS MAIAC AOD等产品提供全面和均匀的覆盖。后者采用各种模型，如统计回归和人工智能，来估计PM浓度，整合气象、土地利用和其他辅助因素。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of estimating near-surface PM10 concentrations differ between medium- and small-scale areas when using coarse-resolution MODIS AOD products versus high-resolution datasets?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在使用粗分辨率的MODIS AOD产品与高分辨率数据集时，估计近地面PM10浓度的挑战在中等规模和小规模区域之间有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Coarse-resolution MODIS AOD products, typically ranging from 3-10 km, are less effective for medium- or small-scale areas, such as urban regions, due to the localized nature of pollution. High-resolution datasets like the 1 km ChinaHighPM10 dataset provide more accurate estimations and are better suited for detailed studies in these regions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 粗分辨率的MODIS AOD产品通常范围在3-10公里，对于中小规模区域（如城市地区）效果较差，因为污染具有局部性。高分辨率数据集，如1公里的ChinaHighPM10数据集，提供更准确的估计，更适合在这些区域进行详细研究。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges arise in using traditional models for estimating near-surface PM10 concentrations, and how can machine learning methods address these challenges?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在使用传统模型估计近地面PM10浓度时，会出现哪些挑战，以及机器学习方法如何解决这些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Traditional physical, chemical, and statistical regression models often have limited data mining capabilities, which can result in less accurate PM10 estimates. Machine learning methods, such as the ensemble learning approach used in the STET model, can overcome these limitations by effectively integrating spatiotemporal information and leveraging high-resolution datasets, leading to improved estimation of PM10 concentrations.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 传统的物理、化学和统计回归模型通常具有有限的数据挖掘能力，这可能导致PM10估计不够准确。机器学习方法，例如STET模型中使用的集成学习方法，可以克服这些限制，通过有效整合时空信息和利用高分辨率数据集，从而改善PM10浓度的估计。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What underlying factors contribute to the challenges in accurately estimating near-surface PM10 concentrations in China?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致在中国准确估计近地面PM10浓度的挑战的潜在因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Traditional physical, chemical, and statistical regression models generally have less data mining abilities than machine learning methods. Additionally, previous studies have mostly used MODIS AOD products generated from the Dark Target (DT) or Deep Blue (DB) aerosol algorithms at coarser spatial resolutions of 3 – 10 km, which limits the application in urban areas where pollution is more locally concentrated. Moreover, PM10 is less intensively studied than PM2.5 in China, possibly because coarser particles have less impact on human health for the same mass concentration.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 传统的物理、化学和统计回归模型通常在数据挖掘能力上不如机器学习方法。此外，以往的研究大多使用从暗目标（DT）或深蓝（DB）气溶胶算法生成的MODIS AOD产品，这些产品的空间分辨率较粗，通常为3-10公里，这限制了它们在污染更为集中于城市地区的应用。此外，PM10在中国的研究相对较少，这可能是因为相同质量浓度下，粗颗粒对人类健康的影响较小。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the limitations in the application of satellite-based PM estimation methods in small or urban areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致卫星基于PM估计方法在小型或城市地区应用受限的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Satellite-based PM estimation methods often suffer from limitations due to the use of MODIS AOD products at coarser resolutions of 3 – 10 km, which are inadequate for medium- or small-scale areas like urban regions. In these areas, air pollution is much more locally concentrated than in rural regions, necessitating higher resolution data for accurate assessment and analysis.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 基于卫星的PM估算方法常常受到MODIS AOD产品分辨率较粗（3-10公里）的限制，这对于像城市地区这样的中小规模区域来说是不够的。在这些地区，空气污染的局部浓度远高于农村地区，因此需要更高分辨率的数据以进行准确的评估和分析。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects of employing a high-resolution aerosol product like MODIS MAIAC in generating PM10 datasets for China?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用高分辨率气溶胶产品如MODIS MAIAC生成中国PM10数据集的潜在影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Employing a high-resolution aerosol product like MODIS MAIAC allows for the generation of a high-quality PM10 dataset with a spatial resolution of 1 km, which is more suitable for small- and medium-scale air pollution studies. It enables better monitoring of PM10 concentrations, particularly in urban regions, and contributes to a declining trend in PM10 levels over time, as observed over the past five years in China.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用高分辨率气溶胶产品如MODIS MAIAC，可以生成高质量的PM10数据集，空间分辨率为1公里，这更适合小型和中型空气污染研究。它能够更好地监测PM10浓度，特别是在城市地区，并有助于观察到中国过去五年PM10水平的下降趋势。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to develop a high-resolution dataset for PM10 concentrations using advanced AI techniques?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么使用先进的人工智能技术开发高分辨率的PM10浓度数据集很重要？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to create a more accurate dataset that overcomes the limitations of traditional modeling approaches by utilizing ensemble learning and spatiotemporal information, ultimately improving the estimation of near-surface PM10 concentrations across China.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是创建一个更准确的数据集，通过利用集成学习和时空信息，克服传统建模方法的局限性，最终提高对中国近地面PM10浓度的估计。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the key objectives in integrating satellite data and ground-based measurements for air pollution studies in China?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在中国，将卫星数据与地面测量整合用于空气污染研究的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to leverage the complete and uniform coverage provided by satellite remote sensing and combine it with ground-based measurements to establish robust relationships between AOD and PM10, thereby generating a high-quality dataset suitable for small- and medium-scale air pollution studies.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是利用卫星遥感提供的全面和均匀覆盖，与地面测量相结合，建立AOD与PM10之间的稳健关系，从而生成适合小型和中型空气污染研究的高质量数据集。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can ensemble learning approaches be applied to improve the accuracy of PM10 concentration estimates in China?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何应用集成学习方法来提高中国PM10浓度估计的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: An ensemble learning approach, specifically the space-time extremely randomized trees (STET) model, can be applied by integrating spatiotemporal information. This method establishes robust PM10-AOD relationships by utilizing MODIS 1-km MAIAC aerosol products along with additional meteorological, land use, topography, and population data as inputs to generate a high-quality PM10 dataset.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 一种集成学习方法，特别是空间-时间极端随机树（STET）模型，可以通过整合时空信息来应用。该方法利用MODIS 1公里MAIAC气溶胶产品以及额外的气象、土地利用、地形和人口数据作为输入，建立稳健的PM10-AOD关系，从而生成高质量的PM10数据集。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to validate the accuracy of high-resolution PM10 datasets generated from satellite data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于验证从卫星数据生成的高分辨率PM10数据集准确性的程序有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The accuracy of high-resolution PM10 datasets is validated through cross-validation techniques. The dataset mentioned achieves an out-of-sample cross-validation coefficient of determination (CV-R2) of 0.86 and a root-mean-square error (RMSE) of 24.28 μg/m3, which confirms its effectiveness compared to other models in related studies. This process ensures that the dataset is reliable for future air pollution studies.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 高分辨率PM10数据集的准确性通过交叉验证技术进行验证。提到的数据集在样本外交叉验证的决定系数（CV-R2）达到0.86，均方根误差（RMSE）为24.28 μg/m3，这确认了其相较于相关研究中的其他模型的有效性。这个过程确保了该数据集在未来空气污染研究中的可靠性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements have enabled the generation of high-resolution PM10 datasets across China?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在中国生成高分辨率PM10数据集成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of artificial intelligence techniques, including the space-time extremely randomized trees (STET) model, has enabled the generation of high-resolution PM10 datasets. This method integrates spatiotemporal information and utilizes the MODIS 1-km Multi-Angle Implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) aerosol product, along with meteorological, land use, topography, and population data, to establish robust PM10-AOD relationships and produce high-quality datasets.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 人工智能技术的应用，包括时空极端随机树（STET）模型，使得高分辨率PM10数据集的生成成为可能。这种方法整合了时空信息，并利用MODIS 1公里多角度大气校正（MAIAC）气溶胶产品，以及气象、土地利用、地形和人口数据，建立了稳健的PM10-AOD关系，从而生成高质量的数据集。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What are the conditions or challenges that necessitate the development of advanced models for PM10 estimation in China?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在中国，促使PM10估计高级模型发展的条件或挑战有哪些？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Challenges include the limitations of traditional physical, chemical, and statistical regression models in data mining capabilities, the coarse resolution of previous PM10 datasets generated from MODIS AOD products, and the underrepresentation of PM10 studies compared to PM2.5. These challenges necessitate advanced models like the STET model to improve estimation accuracy and applicability, especially in urban areas with locally concentrated air pollution.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 挑战包括传统物理、化学和统计回归模型在数据挖掘能力上的局限性，之前从MODIS AOD产品生成的PM10数据集分辨率较粗，以及PM10研究相较于PM2.5的代表性不足。这些挑战需要先进的模型，如STET模型，以提高估计的准确性和适用性，特别是在局部空气污染集中的城市地区。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How effective do you find the use of artificial intelligence in enhancing the accuracy of PM10 concentration estimates in China?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您认为人工智能在提高中国PM10浓度估计准确性方面的有效性如何？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Artificial intelligence, particularly the space-time extremely randomized trees (STET) model, is highly effective in enhancing the accuracy of PM10 concentration estimates. It integrates spatiotemporal information and utilizes various auxiliary data, resulting in a high-quality PM10 dataset with a CV-R2 of 0.86 and RMSE of 24.28 μg/m3, outperforming many traditional models.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 人工智能，特别是时空极随机树（STET）模型，在提高PM10浓度估计的准确性方面非常有效。它整合了时空信息并利用各种辅助数据，生成了高质量的PM10数据集，CV-R2为0.86，RMSE为24.28 μg/m3，优于许多传统模型。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what potential improvements could be made to data collection methods for PM10 to better address the limitations identified in previous studies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，针对之前研究中识别出的局限性，PM10的数据收集方法可以进行哪些潜在改进？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Improvements could include leveraging advanced machine learning techniques with better data mining capabilities than traditional models, using finer resolution satellite products like the MODIS MAIAC aerosol product, and integrating diverse auxiliary datasets such as meteorology, land use, and population distribution to enhance PM10 concentration estimation.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 改进可以包括利用比传统模型更先进的机器学习技术和更好的数据挖掘能力，使用更高分辨率的卫星产品，如MODIS MAIAC气溶胶产品，以及整合多样的辅助数据集，如气象、土地利用和人口分布，以增强PM10浓度的估计。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how integrating spatiotemporal information enhances the accuracy of air pollution datasets.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白整合时空信息如何提高空气污染数据集的准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Integrating spatiotemporal information allows for a more accurate modeling of PM10-AOD relationships by considering variations in space and time, which leads to the generation of a high-quality PM10 dataset at a spatial resolution of 1 km, utilizing advanced methods such as the space-time extremely randomized trees (STET) model.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 整合时空信息可以更准确地建模PM10与AOD之间的关系，通过考虑空间和时间的变化，从而生成一个空间分辨率为1公里的高质量PM10数据集，采用先进的方法，如时空极端随机树（STET）模型。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the advantages of using artificial intelligence over traditional physical, chemical, and statistical regression models in estimating PM10 concentrations.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对使用人工智能估计PM10浓度相较于传统的物理、化学和统计回归模型的优势感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Artificial intelligence models have greater data mining abilities compared to traditional physical, chemical, and statistical regression models, allowing for more accurate and comprehensive estimation of PM10 concentrations, as evidenced by the improved performance of the space-time extremely randomized trees (STET) approach.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 人工智能模型相比于传统的物理、化学和统计回归模型具有更强的数据挖掘能力，从而能够更准确和全面地估计PM10浓度，这一点通过时空极端随机树（STET）方法的性能提升得到了证明。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of why the PM10 dataset has high relevance despite PM10 being less intensively studied than PM2.5 in China.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解为什么PM10数据集具有较高的相关性，尽管在中国PM10的研究强度低于PM2.5。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The PM10 dataset is highly relevant due to its impact on both the atmospheric environment and human health, with concerns about PM10 contributing to cancer, respiratory diseases, and heart diseases. Moreover, the high-resolution PM10 dataset is particularly useful for small- and medium-scale air pollution studies, providing detailed insights that are crucial for understanding and managing air quality in urban areas.
Assertion.AnswerCn: PM10 数据集与大气环境和人类健康密切相关，因其对癌症、呼吸系统疾病和心脏疾病的影响而引发关注。此外，高分辨率的 PM10 数据集对于小型和中型空气污染研究特别有用，提供了详细的见解，这对于理解和管理城市地区的空气质量至关重要。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the data collection methods used for generating a high-resolution PM10 dataset and any challenges associated with these methods.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述用于生成高分辨率PM10数据集的数据收集方法以及与这些方法相关的任何挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data collection method involves using the space-time extremely randomized trees (STET) model, which integrates spatiotemporal information to establish PM10-AOD relationships. This method utilizes the MODIS 1-km Multi-Angle Implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) aerosol product along with auxiliary data such as meteorological, land use, topography, and population data. Challenges include the less intensive study of PM10 compared to PM2.5 and the limited data mining ability of traditional models compared to machine learning methods.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法涉及使用时空极端随机树（STET）模型，该模型整合了时空信息以建立PM10与气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）之间的关系。该方法利用MODIS 1公里多角度大气校正（MAIAC）气溶胶产品，以及气象、土地利用、地形和人口等辅助数据。挑战包括对PM10的研究相较于PM2.5的研究较少，以及传统模型的数据挖掘能力有限，相较于机器学习方法。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline the methodological approaches used to handle spatial and temporal gaps in satellite-derived aerosol optical depth (AOD) data for PM10 estimation.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 概述用于处理卫星衍生气溶胶光学深度（AOD）数据中的空间和时间缺口以估算PM10的研究方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The methodological approach involves filling spatial gaps in the satellite-derived MODIS MAIAC AOD product using artificial intelligence techniques. Spatiotemporal collocation of daily PM10 ground-based measurements, AOD, and auxiliary factors at each PM10 monitoring station forms the basis for data samples. The STET model employs an ensemble learning approach to integrate spatiotemporal information, thereby improving the estimation of near-surface PM10 concentrations.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 该方法论涉及使用人工智能技术填补卫星衍生的MODIS MAIAC AOD产品中的空间空白。每日PM10地面监测数据、AOD和辅助因素在每个PM10监测站的时空协同形成数据样本。STET模型采用集成学习方法整合时空信息，从而提高近地面PM10浓度的估计。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the potential datasets and auxiliary factors that can be used to generate high-quality PM10 data for research purposes.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述可以用于生成高质量PM10数据的潜在数据集和辅助因素，以供研究使用。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets and auxiliary factors include the Multi-Angle Implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) aerosol product at 1-km resolution and data on meteorology, land-use cover, surface elevation, population distribution, and pollutant emissions. These factors are used in conjunction with the STET model to produce a high-resolution and high-quality PM10 dataset for China. Ground-based monitoring data from China's National Environmental Monitoring Center is also crucial in this process.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集和辅助因素包括1公里分辨率的多角度大气校正（MAIAC）气溶胶产品，以及气象、土地利用覆盖、地表高程、人口分布和污染物排放的数据。这些因素与STET模型结合使用，以生成中国的高分辨率和高质量PM10数据集。来自中国国家环境监测中心的地面监测数据在这一过程中也至关重要。
